member.name: T:Telerik.Reporting.Cache.Database.DatabaseStorage
member.summary: implementation utilizing the various connectivity options provided by the Data Access ORM solution.
member.remarks: Because of the various database engines that are supported the DatabaseStorage is appropriate for single instance deployment scenario only.

members.member:
Creates an instance of the storage.
The backend string identifying the target backend. See Backend Strings and Provider Names List for all available backend storages and corresponding string that should be provided. The backend specific connection string need to connect.
